summary: This bill, HR 1382, aims to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, specifically concerning the San Francisco Bay restoration program. It updates funding mechanisms, allowing for cooperative agreements and grants to various entities, including federal, state, and local agencies. The bill also sets limitations on non-federal recipients, prohibiting funding for entities connected to foreign countries of concern and outlining the required non-federal share for projects. The bill also amends the existing language around the program implementation.
